info.name: Crave TV Big Player
info.description:
Makes the video player take up the whole window size, like Netflix, Disney+ and more streaming platforms.

Installation:
1. Install the style
2. Open Stylish extension, find this style and click on the pencil (Open in editor)
3. Between "Code Section 1" and the code, there is a "+" at the right. Click it.
4. From the dropdown, select "Regex" and paste the following:
^https:\/\/www.crave.ca\/en\/(movies|tv-shows)\/([a-z0-9\-]+)\/([a-z0-9\-]+)$
5. Press save

*You might need to reload the page once on your show/movie or leave it to restore styles, I haven't figured out how Stylish works, but it doesn't automatically correct itself once you navigate.
